docs.title: Welcome to Simha & Sarva associates
docs.text:
Simha & Sarva is a law firm based in Hyderabad, India. The Firm provides legal services across a range of practice areas under Indian law.

The Firm advises clients on legal, regulatory, and procedural aspects of matters before courts, tribunals, and other authorities in India. The Firm’s practice is guided by professional standards, ethical obligations, and applicable laws.

Library reference image for illustrative purposes

docs.title: About the Firm
docs.text:
The firm was established in 2025 and advises clients on matters of Indian law.

The information on this website is provided for general informational purposes only.

docs.title: Areas of Practice
docs.text:
The firm advises clients on matters relating to:

  • Corporate and Commercial Law
  • Arbitration and Dispute Resolution
  • Taxation
  • Regulatory Compliance

The above information is provided for general informational purposes only.
